attributes.action: stop tour operators charging premium prices for family holidays out of term time
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We as responsible parents try not to take our children out of school for family holidays, but when tour operators charge double the price during school holidays what choice do we have?  I would like the government to clamp down on this pratice so that we can take our kids on holiday without affecting their education,  falling foul of the law or overstretching our already stretched finances.
